comments:
I got this exception when the workbench tried to restore a task editor. Could be related to the offline refactoring.

This should have been fixed when I resolved bug#160380 comment#40.  Perhaps the bug you were loading was from before this fix?

No, it was in workspace that I updated after the offline patch had been merged into cvs and I just got the error again while trying to open a Trac task. This could be some type of concurrency issue with opening tasks that are not fully synchronized.
Committed fix for this. Old offline data is corrupt so will require deletion or manual refresh. Additionally I've added a null check upon combo population.
